TopicTitle: AppLauncher notification mod for notifying user when buildings are destroyed

Articles.Content:
I did not see anything similar, so I would like to request a mod that informs the user when a building has been destroyed by having warnings displayed through the AppLauncher (show in red.) This mod would be most useful while on the process of putting a vessel in orbit, especially after 30km for scenarios where the vessel only starts gaining surface speed late in the launch process (which is often happening to me in the 1.0.2)

![0xCuvaw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/0xCuvaw.jpg)

Such warning could simply be a change in the displayed icon so that it is not intrusive ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
Wouldn't using the notification system (the icon in the top-right corner) make more sense?

Well, this approach definitely goes well with the stock notification. However, during a vessel launch I believe that a similar AppLauncher notification like the one implemented on the [ScienceAlert mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76793-0-23-5-ScienceAlert-Experiment-availability-feedback) would be a quicker method in notifying the user that something went kerbalistic... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
